meaning: 목숨 걸고 일함 / with utmost effort
오시다 / to be,to come or to go
받다 / to take a lesson or test
이동하다 / to move house or transfer
매장 / place where things are sold
화내다 / to get angry,to be angry
병문안 / calling on someone who is ill,enquiry
저물다 / to get dark,to come to an end
다음 달 / the month after next
떠들다 / to make noise,to be excited
가능한 한 많이 / as much as possible
고쳐지다 / to be fixed,to be repaired
던지다 / to throw or cast away
입학하다 / to enter school or university
환승하다 / to change between buses or trains
할 것 / it should be so
보통 / usually, or a train that stops at every station
비가 오기 시작하다 / to start to rain
제시간에 대다 / to be in time for
맞이하다 / to go out to meet
끓다 / to boil, to grow hot,to get excited
